channel.title: How do i make it so when i right click a player
channel.description:
hiya agen.. once agen i neeed moparscape fans help
1)how i make it so when i right cick a player it says kick
2)how i make it so when i right cick a player it says ban
3)how i make it so when i right cick a player it says ipban
4)how i make it so when i right cick a player it says mute???
pls mopar fans help me i b soo greatful

item.title: How do i make it so when i right click a player
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Search that in client.java

It will output a string a string, (the string part) which would say, Ban, kick, trade with, etc.

But in order to do the specified things you put, you have to change the case, but i am unfamiliar with all the cases.
